subject: Football
Retirement
lead_paragraph: Kurt Warner announced his retirement after a dozen years in a league that at first rejected him, then revered him as he came from nowhere to lead the St. Louis Rams to two Super Bowls.
snippet: Kurt Warner announced his retirement after a dozen years in a league that at first rejected him, then revered him as he came from nowhere to lead the St. Louis Rams to two Super Bowls.
